title: Beautiful, historic studio in Upper Nob Hill/ Russian Hill
posting_body: This is a beautiful, historic studio in Upper Nob Hill/ Russian Hill that I'm sadly having to vacate as I'm leaving SF.
The apartment has wonderful natural light, ample storage, and a large separate kitchen.
The building management are very responsive and easy to work with.
There is an amazing view from one side of the space.
The studio can come furnished for a highly discounted price.
The sublease will run until January 31, 2023, with the option to renew with the management company.
Heat is included in the rent.
